mapper.select: SELECT uuid, channel_id, level, level_value, prop_id, prop_value, parent from voyageone_ims.ims_mt_prop_value WHERE uuid = #{prop_hash}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO voyageone_ims.ims_mt_prop_value (uuid, channel_id, level, level_value, prop_id, prop_value, parent) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{channel_id}, #{level}, #{level_value}, #{prop_id}, #{prop_value}, #{parent})
